info.headerText: A bad program to solve all your.. err.. actually no, it doesn't really do much at the moment...
info.description: This program is quite simple - essentially, you download it, then it allows you to download other programs without having to come to this site. Issue is, I haven't spent much time on it so far, and so it's still VERY buggy. If you want to use it, it does work, although I wouldn't recommend it for the moment - at least not until I've spent more time on it and managed to squash some of the bugs.
info.knwnBgs:
1. Programs keep downloading once started even if the program is closed.
2. Entire thing has a heart attack if it isn't started in administrator mode.
